title: 大丁喺HKU直線抽擊我迖 到底大丁你係咪想逼死我迖？

replies.msg:

成段Speech句句都針撚住我迖，明明我迖一路都關注緊，點解你要話佢冇良心！！！你係咪引戰狗 ！！！

5:32
"If you take the CCP side or if you become a flag protector, or flag guard or something like that you might get some opportunities in the mainland televisions and places like that and thats a lot of celebrities in Hong Kong are doing right now. They choose to chase a few more bucks into their wallet instead of following whats right and doing what's right. They choose to throw away their conscience, for money. Maybe some of them don't even have a conscience in the very first place."
